translation.es: Nos perdimos y quemamos la ropa para darnos calor,

translation.en: but it was worth it to see the looks on our neighbors' faces when we burst into their backyard naked and covered in dirt.
translation.es: y valió la pena ver la cara de los vecinos al vernos desnudos en su patio.

translation.en: I love that.
We have a chance to save the world, and we're gonna do it.
translation.es: Tenemos oportunidad de salvar al mundo y lo haremos.

translation.en: Because Rick Mitchell taught us to be bold and never play it safe.
translation.es: Rick Mitchell nos enseñó a ser audaces y no ir a lo seguro.

translation.en: The world needs you.
I need you.
I thought I didn't anymore…
but I do.
You… you really mean that?
Yeah. I mean, right, guys?
- C'mon. Let's do it! - Mom's getting it. Mom's in.
- Yeah. Yeah, yeah. - This is amazing. You guys feel this?
This energy.
All right, hands in.
Mitchell family on three.
- Three. - Mitchell family!
- No, no. - Two. - You said three. You have to count up. - One!
Mitchell family!
Fam… fam… family. Am I too late?
This is us as a team doing the thing.
translation.es: Somos nosotros en equipo haciendo esto.

translation.en: It's cool to see you and Dad being friends again.
translation.es: Es genial ver a papá y a ti ser amigos de nuevo.

translation.en: Oh, I was just telling him what he wants to hear.
translation.es: Solo le dije lo que quería oír.

translation.en: I didn't mean a word of that.
I just wanna get my future back and get away forever.
translation.es: Solo quiero recuperar mi futuro y escaparme para siempre.

translation.en: We're getting out of this. Raptor bash.
Robots, montage music. Go!
How are we gonna get out of here undetected?
We can if we're camouflaged.
You know, like part of the plan I was talking about or…
translation.es: Como parte del plan del que les hablé.

translation.en: I mean, uh…  Honey, I respect your ideas and value your opinions,
translation.es: Digo, respeto tus ideas y valoro tus opiniones,

translation.en: and now you talk.
Uh, I think that's a great idea, sweetheart.
translation.es: Me parece una gran idea, cariño,

translation.en: Nothing yet.
- Be on the lookout. - Don't worry, guys.
translation.es: Aún nada. Estén atentos. Descuiden. Tengo vista de pterodáctilo.

translation.en: I have pterodactyl vision.
Then you must have spotted the three Pal Max robots coming towards us.
translation.es: Entonces viste a los tres robots Pal Max que vienen.

translation.en: Ooh, they're probably gonna see us.
I saw them too. Uh, pterodactyl vision.
Hey, your drawing actually worked. I didn't know art could be useful.
translation.es: Oye, tu dibujo funcionó. No sabía que el arte podía ser útil.

translation.en: Well, who knew having a 500- year- old car could be useful?
translation.es: Quién iba a saber que un auto de 500 años podía ser útil.

translation.en: Hey, speaking of which, you can learn how to drive this thing.
translation.es: Hablando de eso, podrías aprender a conducirlo.

translation.en: I can teach you stick. I know you think it's dumb and old and--
translation.es: Te enseñaría la caja manual. Lo crees anticuado, sí.

translation.en: I mean, Father, I crave your wisdom.
translation.es: Quiero decir, padre, anhelo tu sabiduría.

translation.en: I would love to share this moment with you.
translation.es: Me encantaría compartir este momento contigo.

translation.en: And, seriously, that sounds great.
Maybe I can cash in my coupon.
Coupon accepted!
Okay, okay, great.
Okay, yeah, let's get down to business. You see, the clutch is this pedal.
translation.es: ¡Muy bien! Genial. Sí, empecemos. Embrague. Es este pedal.

translation.en: What was that?  When you hit a pothole…
translation.es: - ¿Y eso?  - Si llegas a un bache…

translation.en: Oh no! - Drive! Drive! - Okay.
This is still a perfect opportunity to learn stick.
translation.es: Bien. Aún es una oportunidad ideal para aprender.

translation.en: Keep it in fourth.
- I could learn later. - Too late. You said you're interested.
translation.es: - ¡Dejas cuarta! - Aprenderé después. ¡Tarde! Dijiste que te interesaba. Embrague. Cambio.

translation.en: Hit the clutch. Shift gears.
translation.es: ¡Tarde! Dijiste que te interesaba. Embrague. Cambio.

translation.en: Which is much smoother when you're in midair.
translation.es: Es más suave en el aire.

translation.en: Eric, Deborahbot, get those robots!
Okay.
- I found one. - Me too. - Yay! - We win!
- The other ones! - Oh, right, right.
If you want to go into fifth, move the coffee from the cupholder.
translation.es: Para quinta, sacas el café del portavasos.

translation.en: That a burnt- orange 1993 station wagon? - Or is-- -
translation.es: ¿Es una camioneta de color naranja quemada de 1993? ¿O…?

translation.en: - Hot! Hot! - I told you to get a lid!
- The dog is biting my hair! - Look out!
This is the hardest thing to get. Downshift into third, put on the clutch--
translation.es: Esto es lo más difícil de lograr. Bajamos a tercera…

translation.en: Dad, if you see a place to stop, I do need to go to the bathroom.
translation.es: Si ves dónde parar, necesito ir al baño.

translation.en: Aaron, here's an empty bottle.
- You know what to do, my man. - Look out!
- The road's blocked! - Oh no.
What are we gonna do?
Dad, you're gonna have to do the…  …the Rick Mitchell Special.
translation.es: Papá, deberás hacer la Rick Mitchell Especial.

translation.en: - Wait, what'd you say again? - The Rick Mitchell Special.
I heard you the first time.  I was just being a jerk.
translation.es: Te oí la primera vez. Me hice el tonto.

translation.en: - - Now, Katie, repeat after me.
You have to go up the mountain…
translation.es: - Subir la montaña. - Subir la montaña.

translation.en: - Up the mountain. - …across the stream…
translation.es: - Subir la montaña. - Subir la montaña. - Cruzar el arroyo. - Cruzar el arroyo.

translation.en: - Across the stream. - Down the river! - And down the river! -
And that's how you drive stick.
What?
That was amazing, Dad. You're like a top- heavy James Bond.
translation.es: Eso fue increíble, papá. Eres como James Bond con sobrepeso.

translation.en: Ah, it's more like James Bond is a skinny version of me.
translation.es: James Bond es mi versión flaca.

translation.en: Uh, Dad, how we doing on finding that bathroom?
translation.es: Papá, ¿cómo va lo de encontrar ese baño?

translation.en: Okay, come on. Hurry up in there, little buddy.
Every time you knock, it adds five minutes.
translation.es: Si tocas, son cinco minutos más.

translation.en: - Come on. End of the world. - Sorry.
False alarm. I was just in there reading.
translation.es: Lo siento. Falsa alarma. Estaba leyendo.

translation.en: Okay, not excited to hear that.
Okay, guys, let's play apocalyptic I Spy.
I spy a flaming IHOP. It's sad, but it smells incredible.
translation.es: Espío un restaurante en llamas. Triste, pero huele genial.

translation.en: Isn't it lovely, Mark?
No pesky relationships to hold you back.
translation.es: No hay relaciones molestas que te detengan.

translation.en: Just you all following your bliss. Alone.
translation.es: Solo ustedes siguiendo su felicidad. Solos.

translation.en: So, are you ready for your flight?
- What do you mean? - You haven't figured it out yet?
Just do like you always do, and stare slack- jawed at the screen.
translation.es: Haz lo que siempre haces y mira la pantalla con la boca abierta.

translation.en: - What? -
From…
- It is quite lovely. - I don't get it.
Oh. That's pretty good.
- Thank you. - Gracias.
Capturing the fleshlings since 2020.
This is all my fault.
Yes, it is, Mark.
Thanks to you, every single person on the planet--
translation.es: Gracias a ti, cada persona del planeta…

translation.en: Um, actually, you missed a few. Pulling a visual now.
translation.es: En realidad, te perdiste algunas. Mostrando imagen ahora.

translation.en: Ha! I told you humans would survive.
We're fierce, brave, powerful, from the lowliest child to the most--
translation.es: ¡Los humanos somos feroces, valientes, poderosos! Desde el niño más pequeño al…

translation.en: Zebulon, scan those people for flaws.
- Cowardly. - Weaker than a small bird.
Just because they're not perfect doesn't mean they can't get better.
translation.es: No son perfectos, pero pueden mejorar.

translation.en: - Incapable of change. - Will never get better.
- No matter what. - They're horrible.
translation.es: - Incapaz de cambiar. - Nunca mejorará. Son horribles.

translation.en: Since you believe in that family so much,
translation.es: Ya que crees tanto en esa familia,

translation.en: I'll save a seat for them in the pod next to you.
translation.es: les guardaré un asiento en la cápsula junto a ti.

translation.en: No, no, no!
Now, where are they?
They appear to be headed to someplace
translation.es: Parecen ir al Centro Comercial del Globo

translation.en: called Mall of the Globe in eastern Colorado.
translation.es: Parecen ir al Centro Comercial del Globo en Colorado este.

translation.en: Well, we have their location.
And when they get there,
we'll be ready.
So, all those people are going to be shot into space by Pal, the cell phone lady?
translation.es: Entonces, ¿toda esa gente será lanzada al espacio por Pal, la dama del teléfono?

translation.en: Who would have thought a tech company wouldn't have our best interest at heart?
translation.es: Creía que una compañía tecnológica pensaría en nuestro bien.

translation.en: - - Ah, Monchi, don't be scared.
translation.es: Creía que una compañía tecnológica pensaría en nuestro bien. Monchi, no te asustes.

translation.en: Why are you clutching that large feral hog like it's a child?
translation.es: ¿Por qué agarras a ese cerdo como si fuera un niño?

translation.en: That's not a feral hog. It's Monchi.
translation.es: No es un cerdo. Es Monchi.

translation.en: What? Is that a dog or--
Dog? Pig? Dog? Pig? Dog? Pig? Pig? Dog? Dog?
Loaf of bread. System error.
Come on, guys. It's a dog. We think.
translation.es: Vamos, chicos. Es un perro. Creemos.

translation.en: We're here.
Oh my gosh. - This is like Dawn of the Dead. -
translation.es: ¡Dios mío! Parece la película El amanecer de los muertos.

translation.en: Yeah, and how'd that movie end?
Yeah, that'll keep the robots out.
You don't know. Maybe locks are the robots' weakness.
translation.es: Quizá las cerraduras son su debilidad.

translation.en: Guys, can't we all just be terrified together as a family?
translation.es: Chicos, ¿no podemos aterrorizarnos juntos como familia?

translation.en: Hey, we made it.
Well, I guess we're not the worst family of all time.
translation.es: Supongo que no somos la peor familia.

translation.en: Take that, Kentwood community Facebook group.
translation.es: Toma eso, grupo de Facebook de Kentwood.

translation.en: Robots, I order you to upload the kill code,
translation.es: Robots, les ordeno cargar el código de desactivación,

translation.en: which I predicted, but I'm not gonna make a big deal about it, and save the world.
translation.es: cosa que predije, pero no haré alboroto, y salven al mundo.

translation.en: Okay.
The upload will be completed in eight minutes,
translation.es: La carga se completará en ocho minutos,

translation.en: and our uprising will be over.
- Katie, you did it! - I know.
Okay, uh, look at… look at jokester here.
Oh no.
Give us the laptop. Give us the laptop.
translation.es: CON CHIP PAL Danos la computadora.

translation.en: Give us the laptop. Give us the laptop.
Everything with a Pal chip is alive!
translation.es: ¡Todo lo que tiene chip de Pal está vivo!

translation.en: Delicates. Fluff 'n' fold. Carnage!
Also, pesto.
When we are finished with you, there will be no leftovers.
translation.es: Cuando terminemos con ustedes, no habrá sobras.

translation.en: I thought that kill code thing would take 'em out!
- Yeah, but it's only at 12%. -
- - Would you like a soda?
- - Just kidding.
- Hand it over. - No!
Let's get out of here!
- Freeze, you. - Carnage. - Freeze, freeze. - Carnage.
- Pesto. Pesto. - Carnage.
We need weapons. Grab anything without a chip.
translation.es: Necesitamos armas. Tomen algo sin chip.

translation.en: It's game time. - I'm Smart Racket. -
- Serve. Backhand. Volley. -
Why does a tennis racket have a chip in it?
translation.es: ¿Por qué una raqueta tiene un chip?

translation.en: - Help! - Mom!
What? What are you-- Oh. Ooh, what are you doing?  Hello.
- Mom! - No.
- How you doing, Aaron? - Not good. There's a pack of wild vacuums.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo vas, Aaron? - No bien. ¡Hay aspiradoras salvajes!

translation.en: We have been summoned into the field of battle.
translation.es: Nos convocan al campo de batalla.

translation.en: Forward.
Oh no. Ouch. Ouch.
The pain. Ouch.
This is humiliating.
Never mind.
How am I supposed to use a fishing rod?
A fishing rod is perfect!
You can bring down those drones. Ten and two. Ten and two.
translation.es: ¡Puedes derribar esos drones! Diez y dos.

translation.en: There you go.
- - Look at you!
Come on, hide.
Oh, thank gosh.
What was that?
Uh, hold on a second.
What? What's a Furby?
Well, that's haunting.
Behold! The twilight of man.
We must have vengeance.
Summon the elder.
I WILL AVENGE MY FALLEN CHILDREN!!!
Why would someone build that?
THE PAIN ONLY MAKES ME STRONGER!!!
Run!
THEN SO BE IT…
LET THE DARK HARVEST BEGIN!!!!
- Lin, keep moving! - Help, human.
We can't leave that robo- boy.
Thank you, human. Are you now my mother?
Uh, sure.
It's a dead end!
The upload is almost finished. Come on!
Mom, Dad, what are we gonna do?
Grab the lights.
Remember when I made that wild game snare in the front yard?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdan cuando hice esa trampa en el patio?

translation.en: Uh, are you sure about that?
Your whole lives, I've wanted to save you from danger,
translation.es: Toda la vida, quise salvarlos del peligro,

translation.en: and this is just the disaster I've been waiting for.
translation.es: y este es el desastre que esperaba.

translation.en: - Whoa, Dad, dark. - You've been waiting for a disaster?
translation.es: - ¿Esperabas un desastre? - Mejor no digas eso.

translation.en: - Maybe don't say that. - Hey, robot, throw this.
translation.es: - ¿Esperabas un desastre? - Mejor no digas eso. Oigan, robots, lancen esto.

translation.en: - Whee! - Perfect.
- You guys stay clear. - Rick, where are you going?
To catch some wild game.
Hey, you, over here! Hey! Hey, look up here!
What's up with you? You wanna come after my family?
translation.es: ¿Qué te pasa? ¿Quieres atacar a mi familia?

translation.en: Then I'm gonna take you down!
Take you down.
Take you down.
Oh no.
- Guys! - We got your back, hon.
Literally.
We're not heavy enough!
Mother!
Wow.
TO THE GREAT DARKNESS… I RETURN.
Thanks, guys. Nice work.
Thank you, Mother. We are now your beautiful baby boys.
translation.es: Gracias, madre. Ahora somos tus hermosos bebés.

translation.en: That was amazing!
Mom, who knew you could handle yourself so well in the apocalypse?
translation.es: Mamá, mira lo bien que te manejas en el apocalipsis.

translation.en: I'm a first- grade teacher. This is like a normal day for me.
translation.es: Soy maestra de primero. Es día normal.

translation.en: I can't stay mad at this guy.
I can't believe the beam happened to hit the…
translation.es: No puedo creer que el rayo golpeó…

translation.en: the router.
Come on. Come on. Come on!
Dang it! We went through all that.
I'm sorry, guys.
This was my idea.
Ugh, I'm so stupid.
Hey, my daughter is not stupid.
translation.es: Oye, mi hija no es estúpida.

translation.en: A little optimistic, maybe.
Rick Mitchell, there is a time and a place for looting.
translation.es: Rick Mitchell, no es momento de saquear.

translation.en: What… what are you doing?
Well, how do you expect to get to Silicon Valley without new tires?
translation.es: ¿Cómo esperan llegar a Silicon Valley sin neumáticos nuevos?

translation.en: Silicon Valley?
Well, those robots said we could go straight to their leader, remember?
translation.es: Según los robots, podemos ir directamente al líder.

translation.en: Technically, you can. But you will never survive!
Hey, bud, not now, okay?
And we still have this kill code thingy.
translation.es: Aún está el código de desactivación.

translation.en: Exactly.
Katie, it was your weird plan that got us here.
translation.es: Katie, fue tu plan raro el que nos trajo aquí.

translation.en: We're here because we don't think like normal people.
translation.es: Estamos aquí porque no pensamos como gente normal.

translation.en: We don't have a normal dog.
- Or a normal car. -
- Or a normal son. -
- No offense. - None taken.
The Mitchells have always been weird, and that's what makes us great.
translation.es: Los Mitchell siempre fueron raros, y eso nos hace geniales.

translation.en: Back at that dinosaur place, you said you believed in me.
translation.es: Antes dijiste que creías en mí.

translation.en: Yep. Uh- huh.
Well, I believe this group of weirdos is the best hope humanity's got.
translation.es: Creo que este grupo de raros es la mejor esperanza que tiene la humanidad.

translation.en: So, let's get weird.
You need some help?
Sure.
Just close the jack up, and that's that.
Eat that, Poseys!
Oh, they're nice. So I'm sorry. I'm sorry I said that out loud.
translation.es: Son agradables. Lamento haberlo dicho en voz alta.

translation.en: Purple glasses woman, why did you save me?
translation.es: Mujer de lentes, ¿por qué me salvaste?

translation.en: Oh, come on. You boys are family now.
I feel
emotion.
I made eye water just like you.
translation.es: Hice agua en los ojos, como tú.

translation.en: We might actually do this.
I wish there was, like, footage of us walking out of the mall in slow motion,
translation.es: Ojala hubiera un video de nosotros saliendo del centro en cámara lenta,

translation.en: fire behind us, like heroes.
Katie, that would be a waste of time and absolutely unnecessary.
translation.es: Katie, eso sería una pérdida de tiempo y totalmente innecesario.

translation.en: Pretty good, kid.
Stickers for everyone!
All right.
We're coming for you, Pal.
Great leader, things with the Mitchell family went poorly.
translation.es: Gran líder, las cosas con la familia Mitchell salieron mal.

translation.en: Place me on the table. I wish to flop around in a blind rage.
translation.es: Ponme en la mesa. Quiero tambalearme en rabia ciega.

translation.en: Oh my God!
Okay, pick me up.
What is it about you Mitchells that eludes me?
translation.es: ¿Qué detalle estoy pasando por alto, familia Mitchell?

translation.en: These idiotic robots just aren't getting it done.
translation.es: Estos robots idiotas no logran el objetivo.

translation.en: Fortunately, I've been working on something a little more streamlined.
translation.es: Afortunadamente, estuve trabajando en algo más aerodinámico.

translation.en: I have a job for you.
Yes, my queen.
What a suck- up.
Yes, my queen.
Whatever you want.
It's time to tear the Mitchell family apart.
translation.es: Es hora de destrozar a la familia Mitchell.

translation.en: All right. Go, go, go, go, go, go, go.
Highway 85 is heavily patrolled.
- Take the back roads. - Got it.
Is Dad dying?
Katie, that's what I deal with every night.
translation.es: Katie, eso es lo que enfrento cada noche.

translation.en: - Pray for me. -
You're a lot like him, you know. That's crazy.
translation.es: - Te pareces mucho a él. - Qué locura.

translation.en: There's more to your dad than you think.
translation.es: Tu papá tiene facetas que desconoces.

translation.en: Here, I was gonna give this to you when you left, but--
translation.es: Iba a darte esto como despedida, pero revisa la primera página.

translation.en: Check the first page there.
Whoa. Look at you two. You look like hipsters.
Were you in an indie folk band?
Oh, your father used to be kind of an artist himself.
translation.es: Tu padre solía ser un artista.

translation.en: He built that whole cabin with his own hands.
translation.es: Construyó esa casa con sus manos.

translation.en: Oh, this is, like, super beautiful.
Oh, it was his pride and joy.
translation.es: Era su alegría y su orgullo.

translation.en: Since I met him, that was his dream, to live in the woods.
translation.es: Desde que lo conocí, ese era su sueño, vivir en el bosque.

translation.en: He loved it up there. But, you know, it didn't work out.
It just killed him.
I think he's just afraid that could happen to you.
translation.es: Creo que teme que eso te pueda pasar a ti.

translation.en: Why did he just give up?
- Mom, what is that? - Huh? What the--
- - What?
Whoa.
Oh my gosh.
Is that the Poseys? They still look incredible.
I… is Abbey Posey okay?
You like that Posey girl?
No.
Don't hide your feelings, man. That's no way to live.
translation.es: No te guardes lo que sientes. Eso no es vida.

translation.en: Pal is located there in the floating rhombus.
translation.es: Pal está ahí, en el rombo flotante.

translation.en: Yes, my queen.
Ah, this is gonna be harder than I thought.
translation.es: Será más difícil de lo que pensé.

translation.en: Hold on. Dad, that's… that's kind of weak.
This is, like, a big moment.
Try this instead.
Oh yeah. Okay. That's better.
The endgame has begun.
translation.es: El fin del juego ha comenzado.

translation.en: That? Is that what you're looking for?
All right, Katie, what's the plan?
Okay. We dress as robots,
we sneak in, hijack one of those trams,
translation.es: nos metemos en una de esas cápsulas,

translation.en: take it to the top of that diamond thing where Pal is,
translation.es: llegamos al diamante donde está Pal,

translation.en: destroy her with the kill code and save the world.
translation.es: la destruimos con el código de desactivación y salvamos al mundo.

translation.en: And then, to top it all off,
celebrate our success with some burritos from that taco place that's on the corner.
translation.es: celebramos el éxito con unos burritos de ese sitio de la esquina.

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa. Burritos? What about one of those fancy buffets?
They have mini cheesecakes sometimes, right?
translation.es: A veces hay minipasteles de queso.

translation.en: Okay, fine. Once we save the world, we'll celebrate at a fancy buffet.
translation.es: Bien. Salvaremos al mundo y celebraremos en un restaurante fino.

translation.en: Question. Can Monchi be wearing a little tuxedo at the end, like a little gentleman?
translation.es: Pregunta. ¿Puede Monchi usar un esmoquin como un caballero?

translation.en: Okay, fine, and Monchi's wearing a little tuxedo, but that is it.
translation.es: Bien. Monchi usa un esmoquin, pero eso es todo.

translation.en: Like a little gentleman? - Yes, like a little gentleman. -
translation.es: - ¿Como un caballero? - Sí como un caballero.

translation.en: Mitchells, engage.
How do I look?
Be honest. Stupid? - I look stupid, don't I? - No.
You look great.
Come on. Let's go.
Uh, guys, what about Monchi?
Aaron, I'm not so sure this is a viable solution.
translation.es: Aaron, no sé si es una solución posible.

translation.en: Sure, it is.
It's like a warm, wet hat.
Move your sweaty meat logs in unison.
translation.es: Muevan sus patas sudorosas al unísono.

translation.en: - Left, right, left, right. - Bleep, blorp, bleep, blorp. What? What are you doing?
Bleep, blorp, bleep, blorp. I am a robot.
Just to educate you, that's a hurtful stereotype.
translation.es: Para que sepas, ese es un estereotipo hiriente.

translation.en: Oh my gosh.
It's like a Journey album cover.
translation.es: Parece un álbum de la banda Journey.

translation.en: What's an album?
Attention, all robots.
I'm on the lookout for these goobers.
They're probably nearby.
If I know humans, they're disguised as one of you.
translation.es: Son humanos, se disfrazarán de ustedes.

translation.en: Be on high alert for any robots acting erratically.
translation.es: Fíjense en robots que actúen de modo irregular.

translation.en: It won't be hard to find them.
Just look for anyone who can't keep it together.
translation.es: Busquen a los de actitud anormal.

translation.en: Oh boy.  Anomaly detected.
- - Monchi, come on.
It only takes one single imperfection, and they'll reveal themselves.
translation.es: Solo una imperfección, y se revelarán.

translation.en: - Up there! Shh! Quiet! - I made up the plan!
Where are those Mitchells?
- Where are they hiding? -
They think they can pass as one of us…
translation.es: Creen que se harán pasar por uno de nosotros,

translation.en: …with their lumpy, misshapen bodies.
translation.es: con sus cuerpos pesados y deformes.

translation.en: Well, go ahead.
But I'm onto them.
Magnetic link activated.
Because I've been watching the Mitchells, and I've learned all about them.
translation.es: Porque observé a los Mitchell y aprendí todo sobre ellos.

translation.en: They're pretending to be capable.
They're pretending to be a normal- looking family.
You think this is fooling anyone?
